title: Introducing: Beach Baby
body:
Uplifting, infectiously melodic, and with the driving ferocity of a locomotive, Beach Baby’s debut offering, ‘Ladybird’.

is a very strong effort indeed. Channeling influences of British post-punk and 80’s New Wave, ‘Ladybird’ undulates within a fine haze of apathy without ever becoming lost in the sonic mist, taking the listener to moments of reflection before then thrusting them straight back into the unrelenting movement of the current.

Formed as a four piece, and originally meeting at London’s Goldsmiths College, Beach Baby are very much making the first steps in their career, however with their debut single due out on Chess Club Records/B3SCI on March 30th, along with their debut live shows (listed below), they’ve made the prospect of summer that much more exciting.

Sun 29th March – Paris, La Cigale (w/Jungle)

Weds 8th April – Brighton, Prince Albert

Thurs 9th April – Salford, Eagle Inn

Sat 11th April – Cardiff, Dim Swn Festival

Weds 15th April – London, Courtyard Theatre
